intro: Cyclocodon celebicus, commonly known as the Celebes cyclocodon, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Indonesia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias, and is characterized by its small, clustered flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, with elliptical leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are usually white or pale pink, and it produces small, round berries that contain the seeds. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
